name: Panzer
overview: Here is another work from the Sputnik World group. Panzer , a game halfway between arcade and military strategy based on the PC classic "Codename: Panzers". A development that shows us an approximation of this title for the Commodore 64 . Panzer, short for the name Panzerkampfwagen, whose German meaning means "armored fighting vehicle." Refers to German tanks from World War II. Under this concept and inspired by its namesake for PC Sputnik World presents its new game. The objective of the game will be to take control of the four camps that exist in the battle area, receiving a Medal for each one that we manage to control. This circumstance creates in the player an exploration effect in the first games to discover the elements it contains and plan how to approach the strategy to complete the mission successfully.
